Articles.Content:
Hello! so ive lately been having many ksp crashing from switching the ksc buildings and then crashing to straight up not being able to playing the game and having some windows files corrupted.

My mod list is as follows:

 Flight Manager for Reusable Stages (FMRS) Continued (FMRSContinued 1.2.9.2)

[Note:i have removed ks3p, zerominiavc and modularflight intergrator cuz thats what others said, i also installed everything on ckan]

I have checked no mods and a couple of mods installed ksp and i think its something with mods or my memory.

Right now when it crashes it also deletes my desktop and glitches it and gives unity error and a error that says "memory cannot be written" "0xad349cd9"

Yes i use every single one of them(Most of them are just dependencies) and my specs are kinda low/medium.

Log (Couldnt use pastebin the log was too big):https://mega.nz/file/TDoE3Qgb#LFLyYgyZi8BBmJ3WyWMUJijTT_BZFink7sOJya621BI

Anyways i hope someone can help me.
